Title: Pingu as an Icicle Player
Plot: Pingu has gone out, and meets up with Robby and Pingo. They play a game where one person has to find the others and, once found, get back ?home? before they do. Pingu starts as finder and counts while Robby and Pingo hide. When Pingu starts looking, Pingo creeps up and gets home before Pingu notices.
